resources.string:
Version: 1.0.0
Author: Benedikt Grande
Github: https://github.com/bgrande/pwgenerator-android

This is an Open Source app. Usage on your own behalf! It is provided with no warranties.

The app is compatible with as well as based on https://getvau.lt. Except on some pages where the allowed symbols are restricted and being injected by configuration.

The app provides you with a password generator which generates a password out of a salt (servicename) and your passphrase.
By combining these values you can always recover your password for a specific service or account without using the same password over and over again.

You can leave the domain field empty. If you are using domain based servicenames with a specific pattern it might be useful to use the domain field. You might also want to try the chrome extension https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/easy-password-handling/fobokeococnhobjlfpkoibpjnajichnj.
